name: Multi-Tenant User Registration Workflow
description: Enhanced user registration workflow with multi-tenant support, automatic tenant creation, and RLS compliance

nodes.name: Registration Webhook
nodes.notes: Accepts user registration requests with optional tenant info

nodes.name: Validate & Process Input
nodes.notes: Validates input and determines tenant strategy

nodes.name: Check Registration Type
nodes.notes: Routes to tenant creation or existing tenant flow

parameters.query:
-- Check if tenant already exists
SELECT id, name, slug, status, max_users,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tenant_users WHERE tenant_id = tenants.id AND status = 'active') as current_users
FROM tenants 
WHERE slug = $1 AND status = 'active'
LIMIT 1

nodes.name: Check Existing Tenant
nodes.notes: Check if tenant exists and has capacity

parameters.query:
-- Create new tenant
INSERT INTO tenants (name, slug, plan_type, max_users, max_projects, max_workflows, status)
VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7)
RETURNING id, name, slug, created_at

nodes.name: Create New Tenant
nodes.notes: Creates new tenant for first user

nodes.name: Hash Password & Prepare Data
nodes.notes: Securely hash password and prepare user data
